text: Deadly stillness, deadly portent! Steve awakened early and switched on the radio, which he kept tuned to CBo. The set lighted-up but gave only a low buzzing sound. He had just finished shaving when it came on, with a flat voice repeating: "This is BBC calling . . . this is BBC calling.
handwritten_text: Deadly stillness, deadly portent! Steve awakened early and switched on the radio, which he kept tuned to CBo. The set lighted-up but gave only a low buzzing sound. He had just finished shaving when it came on, with a flat voice repeating: "This is BBC calling . . . this is BBC calling.
